description:
Here's a more modern take on this project: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zca367cND08

How to build chemical spill scatter terrain for your sci-fi or modern tabletop game (Warhammer 40k, Warpath, etc.)

Supplies and Tools: https://www.amazon.com/shop/wylochscraftingvids
Airbrush used in this episode: http://amzn.to/2oXMGRX
Chipboard: https://amzn.to/2EW2f2u
 (UK): https://amzn.to/2AWCMUS
** Disclaimer: If you use these links, I receive a small commission from Amazon.  It does not impact your purchasing experience in any way whatsoever.

D&D 5e Modules: https://www.etsy.com/shop/WylochsArmory

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/WylochsArmory

My Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/WylochsArmory/

Join the Tabletop Crafters Guild: https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

Sponsor: http://www.heroshoard.com/
The home of TrueTiles and other excellent 3D-printable models.
title: How to Make a Chemical Spill for Warhammer 40k
